subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fifth-seeded Serena Williams advanced to the final of the Family Circle Cup by beating Alize Cornet of France, 7-5, 6-3. Vera Zvonareva, seeded ninth, upset fourth-seeded Elena Dementieva, 6-3, 6-7 (2), 6-3, in the other semifinal in Charleston, S.C.
snippet: Fifth-seeded Serena Williams advanced to the final of the Family Circle Cup by beating Alize Cornet of France, 7-5, 6-3. Vera Zvonareva, seeded ninth, upset fourth-seeded Elena Dementieva, 6-3, 6-7 (2), 6-3, in the other semifinal in Charleston, S.C.
